content.html: Test & Code 191: Running your own site for fun and absolutely no profit whatsoever - @brianwisti testandcode.com/191 Having a personal site is a great playground for learning tons of skills. Brian Wisti discusses the benefits of running a his own blog over the years.

Having a personal site is a great playground for learning tons of skills. Brian Wisti discusses the benefits of running a his own blog over the years.

content.html: This was a fun conversation. Listen to me babble about one of my favorite activities: puttering on the site! About to click play because I'm curious how many tangents he had to edit out.
